shelters.name: Harvard Square Homeless Shelter
shelters.lottery: 14-night beds are given out in the morning between 7:30 a.m. and 8 a.m., emergency beds are given away over the phone at exactly 9:30 p.m. when the temperature is below 32 degrees F or there is a 50% or more chance of precipitation. Continue calling one of the numbers until getting through to a director.
shelters.hours: 7 PM to 8 AM, except on Saturday mornings when shelter remains open until 9 AM

shelters.name: RESPOND Inc. Emergency Shelter
shelters.lottery: Safe, confidential 8-bedroom shelter in Somerville. Services available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Average length of stay for residents is 4 months.
shelters.hours: Our business office hours are 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday. Programs and Services staff are available 24/7 via the crisis hotline.
shelters.resources: Confidential shelter. Accepts all gender identities as well as parents of teenage boys. Has children's play area and is ADA approved.
